document_data.caption: A map showing the Port District of Skuld outlined in red.
document_data.name: Port District of Skuld
document_data.mainbody: The '''Port District''' was a walled section of the capital city of [[Skuld]] in [[Mulhorand]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|490 Skuld}}
document_data.Location: The Port District was situated in the northwest corner of Skuld. It was bordered on the west by the [[Alamber Sea]].
document_data.Description: Aside from the docks, access to the Port District was achieved by a single gate along the southern wall that connected to the [[Skuld/Merchant District|Merchant District]].
document_data.Activities: The Port District handled all incoming and outgoing commerical vessels trading wares in Skuld.
